ing: 4 cups Pepperidge FarmÂ® Herb Seasoned Stuffing
1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup or Campbell'sÂ® Condensed 98% Fat Free Cream of Mushroom Soup
des: "This easy version of Grandma's specialty features seasoned stuffing and chicken baked in a creamy mushroom sauce."
ins:
Mix water and butter.  Add stuffing.  Mix lightly.
Spoon stuffing along center of 3-quart shallow baking dish.  Arrange chicken on each side of stuffing and sprinkle with paprika.
Mix soup, milk and parsley.  Pour over chicken.  Cover.
Bake at 400 degrees F for 30 minutes or until done.
